song.title: Empty Dreams
song.info:
Winner of SDCompo round 70.#
Lyrics:
you want / you wanted / you exercise your right to choose you slide / you hold on / you mutilate all that you made you're spent / you're broken / can't spare another cent to waste
temptation, desire / adjacent to these eyes please talk to me / in empty dreams
you slide / you hold on / you are the one they called upon you take / you're taken / you take in all that which was faked
temptation, desire / adjacent to these eyes please talk to me / in empty dreams
temptation, desire / encapsulating lies please talk to me / in empty dreams
